headline: Data Intelligence - CafeMedia
summary:
• Solutions-driven Data Analytics Professional with 7 plus years of experience in building Analytics/Business Intelligence solutions.
• Proven ability to create valuable transformative business strategies and impactful insights through measurement, manipulation, dissemination, transformation, and reporting of broad sets of data using an array of data analytics tools and frameworks. 
• Highly skilled in articulating narrative in a data-set using skills of data exploration, statistical inference, and visualization.
• Well-versed in using an analytical and cross-functional mindset needed in managing multiple stakeholders and client relations.

experiences.title: Data Analyst
experiences.description:
• Key player in Video Analytics team building analytical frameworks to enhance audience measurement and reporting at scale.
• Accomplished a 26% YoY improvement in Digital Video reporting timelines through multiple data integration and process automation initiatives and developed anomaly detection models to enhance accuracy of reporting metrics in 28 countries.
• Developed multiple data-driven decision models and digital video consumption profiles through complex PostgreSQL querying and data manipulation using Python to augment reporting on digital video landscape, market trends and key metrics.
• Produced visualization dashboards using Tableau and QlikView to deliver impactful insights on audience behavior of digital media consumption across multiple platforms and geographies, thereby providing higher ROI to content owners and publishers.
• Designed methodologies to account for upstream collection issues and devised big data scaling strategies by synthesizing data from ad servers, panel meters, and URL streams on Hadoop using big data tools such as PySpark, SparkSQL, Pig and Hive.
• Automated legacy processes and enhanced demographic profiling through ETL pipelines, chaining pgSQL, Python scripts in Borg to capture entity specific tag drops at initial stages thereby assuring monthly production turnaround times are optimized.
• Served as a liaison between Engineering, Analytics, Production & Delivery, Client Insights, and Operations in cross-functional projects to create analytical products and drive efficient decision making at scale.
• Contributed to the overall company’s data/analytics strategies by supporting cross-training and knowledge sharing, thought leadership as well as encouraging data-driven decision-making process.

experiences.title: Data Analyst
experiences.description:
• Developed Air Cargo scheduling models for UPS Global Freight Forwarding operations, involving complex data transformation in SQL Server and application into Quantrix Modeler, Python and Tableau for data assessment, visualization and insights.
• Manipulated and analyzed high-volume, high-dimensionality data from varying market sources using a variety of data analytics tools and techniques in R Programming to develop market sizing models for UPS’s Mexico trans-border segment strategy.
• Empowered stakeholders at DFW Airport Authority to make data-driven optimal cargo warehousing decisions by developing multiple cargo market penetration models using T-SQL, Python (Pandas, Numpy, Seaborn, Plotly etc.), and Tableau.
• Analyzed existing fleet characteristics and operational metrics to develop financial models in Quantrix linked with Periscope for reporting complex financial metrics, utilized to submit a multi-million dollar bid for Commonwealth Express Trucking.
• Conducted data mining, EDA, statistical analysis, and time-series forecasting using R, Python and Tableau to develop profit estimation, market attractiveness vs. ability to impact models for a private equity firm investing in ground handling companies.
• Established cost optimization and targeted pricing models in Python and Tableau by transforming data from multiple external sources into insights to recommend optimal solutions leading to operational efficiencies for clients in transportation industry.
• Validated project proposals, estimated project timelines and costs, developed presentation decks, and provided clients with training on usage of business intelligence tools and visualization dashboards developed to assist with business development.

experiences.title: Business Assessment Analyst
experiences.description:
• Responsible for providing analytic and reporting services in support of all revenue-generating business lines for USP.
• Performed pricing analysis, product market forecast modeling, and structured USP’s 3000+ items in Python and Advanced Excel to measure effectiveness of price changes and recommended corrective action for approval by USP Pricing Committee.
• Prepared reports for management highlighting operational/financial performance metrics, historical results, forecasts, and trends. 
• Highly involved in activities related to analyzing sales data, operational analysis, monthly closing, data processing, codification, product-market assessments, revenue forecasting, standard setting procedures, and development of custom business solutions.
• Subject matter expert in setting up self-service BI analysis tools and providing effective training to globally located end users.

experiences.title: Finance Associate
experiences.description:
• Worked closely with project business sponsors to develop Vision and Scope Document, Business Requirements and Functional Requirements that support the strategic and tactical initiatives as driven by the business project priorities.
• Performed Risk Analysis and Validation in Primavera to provide quick solutions to handle unprecedented requests from clients.

education.description:
•Awarded 100% merit based scholarship. 
•Graduate teaching assistant – Operations Research Methods, Project Management and Engineering Statistics.

accomplishment_projects.title: MASTER OF SCIENCE PROJECT
accomplishment_projects.description:
•Developed working model for manufacturing Pentaerythritol. Evaluated thermodynamic feasibility, material & energy balance, equipment design and instrumental process control involved.
•Examined factors impacting site selection & plant layout, services & utilities, profitability and cost of the project.

certifications.name: Certificate in Business Analytics & Decision Sciences
